description: Number of strict 7th-order maximal independent sets in path graph.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
R. Yanco and A. Bagchi, ``K-th order maximal independent sets in path and cycle graphs,'' J. Graph Theory, submitted, 1994, apparently unpublished.
formula: Apparently G.f. -x^9/((x^9+x^2-1)*(x-1)^2*(1+x)^2) with recurrence a(n)= 3*a(n-2) -3*a(n-4) +a(n-6) +a(n-9) -2*a(n-11) +a(n-13). [From _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 30 2009]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_
